message: So it turns out making Main async was removed from .NET Core (see [https://github.com/aspnet/A...](https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/113) "https://github.com/aspnet/Announcements/issues/113)") but there is an easy workaround. See the answer by Nate at [http://stackoverflow.com/qu...](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38114553/are-async-console-applications-supported-in-net-core "http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38114553/are-async-console-applications-supported-in-net-core")
